Package com.example.homeheirs

Class FirebaseOperations

java.lang.Object
com.example.homeheirs.FirebaseOperations
public class FirebaseOperations extends Object
This is a class that is reposible for all database interactions Involves method for adding items, tags, as well as deleting items

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FirebaseOperations(android.widget.TextView total_estimated_value, String userID)
    Class Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addData(Item item)
    Method for adding an Item to the firestore database Updates for Future - Work on changing how it relies on Item name in order to store- pick something unique Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Firebase documentation URL : https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/manage-data/add-data
    void
    addtag(ArrayList<Item> itemsToUpdate)
    Method for updating tags to firebase db iterates through and updates ie re adds (maybe) each sequential item to be updated Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Firebase documentation URL : https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/manage-data/add-data
    void
    deleteData(ArrayList<Item> itemsToDelete)
    Method for deleting Items from firebase db Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Code from lab
    ArrayList<Item>
    get_dataList()
    Getter method for Retrieving dataList, which contains all our objects
    void
    listenForDataChanges()
    Method for checking when data is changed, and updating our realtime database following Main logic taken from labs Updates the total cost as well to make ensure realtime updates
    void
    setAdapter(RecyclerViewAdapter Adapter)
    Method required to enable updates to the Recyclerview Adapter for realtime change
    void
    updateFullCost()
    Method that sets the Textview to reflect changes made ie adding/deleting items Updates the total cost on screen by iterating through whole DataList

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • FirebaseOperations

      public FirebaseOperations(android.widget.TextView total_estimated_value, String userID)
      Class Constructor. When Called initializes the database and sets to interact with the initial collection- to be changed depending on the User in the future
      Parameters:
      total_estimated_value - : Required due to strange bug not correctly updating the total cost so its done here

  • Method Details

    • listenForDataChanges

      public void listenForDataChanges()
      Method for checking when data is changed, and updating our realtime database following Main logic taken from labs Updates the total cost as well to make ensure realtime updates

    • addData

      public void addData(Item item)
      Method for adding an Item to the firestore database Updates for Future - Work on changing how it relies on Item name in order to store- pick something unique Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Firebase documentation URL : https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/manage-data/add-data

    • deleteData

      public void deleteData(ArrayList<Item> itemsToDelete)
      Method for deleting Items from firebase db Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Code from lab

    • addtag

      public void addtag(ArrayList<Item> itemsToUpdate)
      Method for updating tags to firebase db iterates through and updates ie re adds (maybe) each sequential item to be updated Updates full cost to reflect changes Source Used : Firebase documentation URL : https://firebase.google.com/docs/firestore/manage-data/add-data

    • updateFullCost

      public void updateFullCost()
      Method that sets the Textview to reflect changes made ie adding/deleting items Updates the total cost on screen by iterating through whole DataList

    • get_dataList

      public ArrayList<Item> get_dataList()
      Getter method for Retrieving dataList, which contains all our objects
      Returns:
      dataList - A list of item objects containing all data

    • setAdapter

      public void setAdapter(RecyclerViewAdapter Adapter)
      Method required to enable updates to the Recyclerview Adapter for realtime change
      Parameters:
      Adapter - - A recylceviewAdapter that is notified whenever data is manipulated
